title: One Piece Episode 426: A Gold Lion's Ambitions on the Move! â€“ SideReel Review
author: Anime Reel
description: A review of Episode 426 discussing how the special introduces the villainous Gold Lion Shiki and noting that the episode was penned by Oda himself. The reviewer appreciated seeing the whole Straw Hat Crew back together as a nice break from the serious arcs.
